title: CRM Specialist
description:
The Company

Ferryhopper is revolutionizing online ferry booking. We are collaborating with more than 53 major and smaller ferry companies to offer ferry itineraries to 250 destinations in the Mediterranean and we will keep expanding our horizons to new destinations. We always strive to cater to the needs of all travelers and to improve our services.

The Role

Analyzing and managing data and information associated with customer relationships is one of the most important things regarding our marketing strategy. We are currently looking for a full-time CRM Specialist to be the vital nerve center of our digital campaigns! You will be part of our growing Marketing team in Athens, encouraging customer retention and customer loyalty.

Responsibilities

  • Review and select CRM software and architecture that meets our company’s needs
  • Monitor and maximize customer lifetime value strategies ensuring maximum ROI
  • Ensure the database is segmented effectively for targeted marketing activities and maintain lists of segmented customers
  • Develop testing strategies for all aspects of the CRM to ensure the most effective approach for the company and its products
  • Research our competition and plan accordingly
  • Monitor multi-channel marketing campaigns
  • Suggest new methods and channels to address customers’ needs
requirements:
Requirements 

  • Knowledge of online marketing methods, best practices, and CRM tools
  • Technical expertise with CRM and analytical systems
  • Solid background in customer acquisition, remarketing, and retention strategies
  • Analytical and technical skills regarding the development of consumer segmentation models
  • Data enthusiast & team player
  • Attention to detail and highly-organized

    Benefits

    Our team is our number one priority; we offer an amazing working environment. This includes:

    • Competitive compensation package
    • Equipment of your choice
    • Access to training and education material
    • Great office space at the heart of Athens
    • Growth opportunities
    • Flexible working hours & remote working
